official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to require a State receiving a block grant for prevention and treatment of substance use disorders to describe the State's efforts to encourage and promote work and employment to improve mental health and well-being.
short_title: Promote Work and Improve Health Act of 2022

summary.text:
Promote Work and Improve Health Act of 2022

This bill requires states to describe their efforts to improve mental health and well-being through promoting work and employment as part of their plans for providing mental health services under the Community Mental Health Block Grant program.
